solution_line_template: The oranges would've cost ${oranges_cost} because {num_passengers} x {orange_price} = <<{num_passengers}*{orange_price}={oranges_cost}>>{oranges_cost}
The proportion of their original spending plan was .4 because {oranges_cost} / {planned_spending} = <<{oranges_cost}/{planned_spending}={proportion_saved}>>{proportion_saved}
They saved 40% of the money they planned to spend because {proportion_saved} x {percent_factor} = <<{proportion_saved}*{percent_factor}={percent_saved}>>{percent_saved}
